titleNullable: Links to all articles of many tech sites (800k)
subtitleNullable: Contains links to Tech News Articles from top tech news sources (800k articles)
descriptionNullable:
I've curated links to all articles from the following tech news site for those of you out there looking for a source of a tech news database. I am also working on scraping all these articles for Titles, descriptions, Pub_Date, Natural Language generated Keywords, and summary of the content as well as content categorization & will update this page soon with the database to all these scraped articles:
techneg.co.in
wccftech.com
techradar.com
techcrunch.com
venturebeat.com
wired.com

The total number of links to articles is around 800k
